id: Hacking Probe Spurs Back-and-Forth on Eve of Georgia Governor’s Race
paragraph:
November 17, 2018Georgia’s secretary of state and Republican gubernatorial nominee said Sunday his office is investigating the state’s Democratic Party over what it called a failed hacking attempt of the voter-registration system, a charge his Democratic opponent called a distraction in a high-profile election that has been dominated by issues of race and voting rights.In a short statement on its website, the office of Republican Brian Kemp said little about its investigation and offered no evidence, saying only that the probe began Saturday...
